curator_overview: Essential services around Wellington International so you can handle errands and logistics without losing ring time. Focus on quick stops, reliable deliveries, and show-season rentals.
curator_cta_text: Plan essentials early — delivery slots, tack drops, and golf cart rentals sell out fast during WEF.

grocery.description: Closest and most reliable grocery stores for quick stops and Instacart delivery.

spots.name: Publix Super Market
spots.notes: Most barns order Instacart from here — reliable same-day delivery.

spots.name: Whole Foods Market
spots.notes: Good for prepared meals and organic staples between classes.

pharmacy.description: Pharmacies with extended hours and reliable prescription refills.

spots.name: CVS Pharmacy
spots.notes: 24-hour drive-thru pharmacy; handy for late-night barn emergencies.

spots.name: Walgreens
spots.formatted_address: 9915 Lake Worth Rd, Lake Worth, FL 33467
spots.notes: Reliable for quick pickups; ~10 minutes from showgrounds.

feed_tack_bedding.description: Equestrian supply outlets that deliver directly to stalls.

spots.name: Trilogy Equine Supply
spots.notes: Show-season specialist — bedding, shavings, and tack trunk deliveries.

spots.name: Dover Saddlery
spots.notes: National chain with full tack and equipment inventory; quick turnaround for in-barn delivery.

car_rental.description: Agencies offering quick pickup near venue or airport.

spots.name: Enterprise Rent-A-Car
spots.notes: Close to venue; good for weeklong SUV rentals.

spots.name: Palm Beach International Airport Car Rentals
spots.formatted_address: 1000 James L Turnage Blvd, West Palm Beach, FL 33415
spots.notes: Best option if flying in trainers/owners for short stays.

golf_cart_rental.description: Local providers renting golf carts for use around the showgrounds and nearby housing.

spots.name: WEC Golf Carts
spots.notes: Standard provider during WEF; reserve well in advance.

spots.name: Dever Golf Car Sales & Rentals
spots.notes: Offers barn packages and on-site support for breakdowns.
